verses.verse: And I saw<WG1492> another<WG243> mighty<WG2478> angel<WG32> come<WG2597> down<WG2597> from heaven,<WG3772> clothed<WG4016> with a cloud:<WG3507> and a rainbow<WG2463> was on his head,<WG2776> and his face<WG4383> was as it were the sun,<WG2246> and his feet<WG4228> as pillars<WG4769> of fire:<WG4442>

And he had<WG2192> in his hand<WG5495> a little<WG974> book<WG974> open:<WG455> and he set<WG5087> his right<WG1188> foot<WG4228> on the sea,<WG2281> and his left<WG2176> foot on<WG1909> the earth,<WG1093>
And cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> as when a lion<WG3023> roars:<WG3455> and when<WG3753> he had cried,<WG2896> seven<WG2033> thunders<WG1027> uttered<WG2980> their voices.<WG5456>

And when<WG3753> the seven<WG2033> thunders<WG1027> had uttered<WG2980> their voices,<WG5456> I was about<WG3195> to write:<WG1125> and I heard<WG191> a voice<WG5456> from heaven<WG3772> saying<WG3004> to me, Seal<WG4972> up those things which<WG3739> the seven<WG2033> thunders<WG1027> uttered,<WG2980> and write<WG1125> them not.
And the angel<WG32> which<WG3739> I saw<WG1492> stand<WG2476> on the sea<WG2281> and on the earth<WG1093> lifted<WG142> up his hand<WG5495> to heaven,<WG3772>

And swore<WG3660> by him that lives<WG2198> for ever<WG165> and ever,<WG165> who created<WG2936> heaven,<WG3772> and the things that therein<WG1722> <WG846> are, and the earth,<WG1093> and the things that therein<WG1722> <WG846> are, and the sea,<WG2281> and the things which are therein,<WG1722> <WG846> that there should be time<WG5550> no<WG3756> longer:<WG2089>

But in the days<WG2250> of the voice<WG5456> of the seventh<WG1442> angel,<WG32> when<WG3752> he shall begin<WG3195> to sound,<WG4537> the mystery<WG3466> of God<WG2316> should be finished,<WG5055> as he has declared<WG2097> to his servants<WG1401> the prophets.<WG4396>

And the voice<WG5456> which<WG3739> I heard<WG191> from heaven<WG3772> spoke<WG2980> to me again,<WG3825> and said,<WG3004> Go<WG5217> and take<WG2983> the little<WG974> book<WG974> which<WG3588> is open<WG455> in the hand<WG5495> of the angel<WG32> which<WG3588> stands<WG2476> on the sea<WG2281> and on the earth.<WG1093>

And I went<WG565> to the angel,<WG32> and said<WG3004> to him, Give<WG1325> me the little<WG974> book.<WG974> And he said<WG3004> to me, Take<WG2983> it, and eat<WG2719> it up; and it shall make<WG4087> your belly<WG2836> bitter,<WG4087> but it shall be in your mouth<WG4750> sweet<WG1099> as honey.<WG3192>

And I took<WG4327> the little<WG974> book<WG974> out of the angel's<WG32> hand,<WG5495> and ate<WG2719> it up; and it was in my mouth<WG4750> sweet<WG1099> as honey:<WG3192> and as soon<WG3753> as I had eaten<WG5315> it, my belly<WG2836> was bitter.<WG4087>
And he said<WG3004> to me, You must<WG1163> prophesy<WG4395> again<WG3825> before<WG1909> many<WG4183> peoples,<WG2992> and nations,<WG1484> and tongues,<WG1100> and kings.<WG935>
